meanings.definition: Rounded and plump in a way that is attractive.
meanings.sent1: The chubby cheeks of the baby made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: She had a chubby face that looked cute in photos.
meanings.sent3: The chubby squirrel struggled to fit more nuts in its mouth.
meanings.sent4: Her chubby fingers grasped the pencil tightly as she drew.
meanings.sent5: The chubby puppy waddled around the yard, melting hearts with its cuteness.

meanings.definition: A chubby person or body part.
meanings.sent1: The chubby in the mirror made her giggle.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the chubby of the group due to his round belly.
meanings.sent3: The chubby on the playground was always the fastest runner.
meanings.sent4: Her chubby was like a soft pillow to lean on during the movie.
meanings.sent5: The chubby on the baby's arm was so squishy and adorable.
